5k

October 9, 2021

839 ft.

9:00 a.m.

68°F

Register Course Information Course Maps Aid Stations Racer Information Rules & Etiquette Results & Entrants

Course Information

Description

You will run on many trails throughout Corner Canyon to name a few, Ghost Falls, Rattler, Turkey Road, Clarks Trail, Anne’s Trail, Canyon Hollow, Oak Hollow, Bonneville Shore Line and the famous Widowmaker climb

Marking and Signage

You will be following the florescent orange ribbon with signage for critical turns and juctions

Keep an eye out for caution tape that are meant to show the wrong direction. Dont cross over them!

Course Maps

Profile

839 ft. total gain

5,009 ft. max elevation

Map
Launch Map Download GPX

Aid Stations

Aid Station Mile Type
Creek View 1.5 mi. Full Service

** Full Service Aid Stations include:

  • Power Gels
  • Sport Drink
  • Water
  • Salty snacks and goodies

Racer Information

Packet Pick-up

Friday, October 8, 2021

4-7:30 p.m.

Wasatch Running Center

8946 State St.

Sandy, UT 84070

Get Directions

** We have a mandatory check in policy day of race. Please allow enough time to park and check-in

** There will also be packet-pickup race morning from 5:00-5:30 a.m.

Finish Line

There will be some snacks and sandwiches at the finish line. We hope you plan on staying around and getting a complimentary massage, telling us your stories and watching your friends finish

Awards

There will be awards given to the top 3 male and female 50K, 25K & 5K finishers

Rules and Etiquette

DNF/Drop From Race:

If you need to drop from the race it is critical you let an aid station volunteer know you will not finish the race. You can also have someone on your behalf come to the start/finish line and notify us that you have dropped and where

Litter & Dogs

Pack out what you pack in:

We ask for your cooperation to make sure there is no littering on the course. We have worked hard with Draper City and the US Forest Service to allow us to put on the race on

No dogs allowed. Sorry about that
